NomaiObject: solely 1 PHLOX: Papa! My sand dwelling was toppled by the waves again! 2 1 PHLOX: Why does the ocean hate my sand dwellings? Are they not good enough, papa? 3 2 PLUME: The ocean means no harm towards your lovely little dwellings, my dear Phlox. Perhaps you might be building them too close to the shoreline? 4 3 PHLOX: But papa, it's easier to build with the damp sand.. And I build them further and further up each day, but the ocean always seems to follow! The ocean is so mean! 5 4 PLUME: I apologize on its behalf, my dear Phlox. But like the universe, the ocean is - and we are. It bears no conscious thought, nor ill will against us. 6 5 PHLOX: Papa, could you ask the universe to be less mean? 7 6 PLUME: I will.. do my best. But in the meantime, would you like to sculpt something with papa instead? What would you like to sculpt today? 8 7 PHLOX: Yes, let's sculpt instead! Could we sculpt a miniature of the Looming City? Papa's dwellings always look so incredibly cool! 9 8 PLUME: Of course! That would make papa very happy indeed. And Phlox: papa is sure that someday, you'll grow up to be an even better architect than him! LC EX2 5
